Request body to obtain a list of live running algorithms. The /live/list API accepts requests in the following format:

ListLiveAlgorithmsRequest Model - Request for a list of past and present live deployments.
projectId integer
Id of the project to include in response. If you omit this property, the response includes all your projects.
status string Enum
Status of the live deployments to include in the response. If you omit this property, the response includes deployments with any status. Options : ['Running', 'Stopped', 'RuntimeError', 'Liquidated']
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "status": "Running"
}
